subject: Deaths (Obituaries)
Baseball
lead_paragraph: Mr. Van Wieren, known as the Professor for his encyclopedic knowledge of baseball and the extensive research he did for each broadcast, spent 33 years with the Braves before retiring in 2008.
snippet: Mr. Van Wieren, known as the Professor for his encyclopedic knowledge of baseball and the extensive research he did for each broadcast, spent 33 years with the Braves before retiring in 2008.
